availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Woodford F. Miller (Warren County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer.)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Anna Flora in Warren County, Kentucky, on March 14, 1844. Father of John Miller, Elizabeth Miller, and Benjamin Miller. Married to Cynthia C. Jordan in Warren County, Kentucky, on October 14, 1855. Father of James M. Miller and Ash C. Miller. Laborer in Warren County in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
